attributes.title: Took 4 days to download
attributes.review: I was exited to get this app so when I was downloading it a carrot came out of my screen and told me to wait 30 seconds. I was super excited but I ended up waiting 4 days. And when it was done an orange came out of my screen and told me. So when I opened the app a pepperoni came out and slapped me in the face 403,921,713 times before smashing my phone with a hammer. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP!!!

attributes.title: Wow really wanted to support but!
attributes.review: Wow I really wanted to support my amazing president and download this app! Let me tell you fellow Trump Supporters, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!! It took forever to download and made my phone crash every time I opened it! I probably have a virus now!

attributes.title: do NOT try this app
attributes.review: This app promotes violence because of the person it promotes. if anyone downloads this app seeking for hope, you are at the wrong place. i’m completely and utterly speechless and absolutely disgusted by this platform.

attributes.title: Big Jenny Mistake
attributes.review: So I was trying to download talking angela so she can stalk me through her cutie pa tutie eye 🥰😝🌸❤️😻 UNTIL my finger slipped and downloaded this piece trash. Never again tho. But you should watch 365 days, although it has horrible acting. It has a really REALLY good throat grab at the end 😩🥰😍. And that throat grab is a 10/10 so you should watch it. Also how was your day? I hope it great. Mine was horrible because of this tragedy right here 😫😤😭😡😩🤯😨. I’m very very very very 10 more very’s sad that i ran out of hot cheetos and takis. Which means i can’t be the hot cheetos girl at my house! 😣😞😭✌️. Tragic am i right? Anyways another netflix movie you should watch is Clueless. The.most.awesome.thing. that.I’ve.ever.watched. PERIODT. So you should watch it. I’m not going to tell you what’s in it because thats my little secret 😻😽🥰😍😝😊. OVERALL a lesson that learn today is DONT SLIPPED YOU DUMB FINGER TO THIS PIECE OF TRASH APP. Hope you have a nice day! 🥰🥰🥰🥰😘😘😘😘😍😍😍😝😝

attributes.title: trump 2020✨🧚‍♀️💅 in a graveyard ✨💅🧚‍♀️
attributes.review:
i downloaded this app to educate myself on the racist, sexist, homophobic, and hateful person that america calls their president. but after i downloaded it i started to see signs of my phone being destroyed. at the beginning i was so excited for this app because i wanted to help the “president” make america great again. this app wiped out my whole identity. i have people hacking my email and my other apps. this app has hi-jacked all of my personal media. so moral of the story DO NOT DOWNLOAD!

ps. as the tiktok audio says “donald trump is a white supremacist full stop. if u vote for him again u are a white suptemacist full stop

attributes.title: THE WORST APP EVER🤢🤢
attributes.review: Sooo I went to go download this app and it took three hours to download 🤦🏾‍♀️🤦🏾‍♀️ with my impeccable internet. After it finished downloading it took forever to load😤😤. When it finished loading and I managed to get to the sign up it asked me questions that I wasn’t comfortable answering like my social security number and other questions that I didn’t feel like was necessary. While I was doing the sign up my phone started to vibrate uncontrollably and anytime I would exit the app the vibrating would stop. After waiting three hours to download the app I wasn’t going to wait another three hours💩💩. So after I finished with the sign up and I got to the actually app all I saw were dancing monkeys which was confusing because I thought this app for Trump. I decided to try again with the app later. I was in the line for chick fil a and I thought to try to app again. When I opened the app my car starting playing the Big Green Tractor song so long that my car was shaking. After that I deleted the app. I don’t recommend this app at all. DONT WASTE YOUR TIME!!!!!!!
